foundryvtt-tokeneffects.overlayColor.hin: Color for overlay icons as a hex string (rrggbb)
foundryvtt-tokeneffects.overlayAlpha.hin: Opacity of overlay icons (0 = fully transparent, 1 = fully opaque)
foundryvtt-tokeneffects.statusBackground: Background color of status icons as a hex string (rrggbb)
Opacity of status icon background (0 = fully transparent, 1 = fully opaque)
foundryvtt-tokeneffects.statusBorderColo: Color of status icon border as a hex string (rrggbb)
foundryvtt-tokeneffects.statusBorderWidt: Width in pixels of status icon border
foundryvtt-tokeneffects.statusColor.name: Status Icon Color
foundryvtt-tokeneffects.statusColor.hint: Color for status icons as a hex string (rrggbb)
foundryvtt-tokeneffects.statusAlpha.name: Status Icon Opacity
foundryvtt-tokeneffects.statusAlpha.hint: Opacity of status icons (0 = fully transparent, 1 = fully opaque)
foundryvtt-tokeneffects.notokenanimEnabl: Enable/Disable Disable Token Movement Animations feature
Dragging and dropping tokens around the map will resolve instantly instead of sliding.
foundryvtt-tokeneffects.tokenVisionAnima: Enable/Disable Token Vision Animation: World Scope feature
Sets 'Token Vision Animation' setting from client to world. Now you can move player tokens safely without disclosure of scene data in the middle of movement.
foundryvtt-tokeneffects.tokenFactionsEna: Generate token bases based on token disposition or actor folder color.
